title: description
Lady Gaga & Beyonce's Arrack Cooler: A sick variant of the Arrack Cooler. As sick as Lady Gaga & Beyonce's hand.

title: notes
Lady Gaga & Beyonce's Arrack Cooler: Arrack, Sugar and a hint of favorite.

title: pairing
Lady Gaga & Beyonce's Arrack Cooler: Lady Gaga & Beyonce have it with a favorite Coca Cola and bomboloni.

title: serving_suggestion
